columns.Description: Unique identifier for the device in the service
columns.Name: DeviceId

columns.Description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the device
columns.Name: DeviceName

columns.Description: Platform of the operating system running on the device. This indicates specific operating systems, including variations within the same family, such as Windows 10 and Windows 7
columns.Name: OSPlatform

columns.Description: Version of the operating system running on the machine
columns.Name: OSVersion

columns.Description: Architecture of the operating system running on the machine
columns.Name: OSArchitecture

columns.Description: Version number of the software product
columns.Name: SoftwareVersion

columns.Description: Unique identifier assigned to the security vulnerability under the Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE) system
columns.Name: CveId

columns.Description: Severity level assigned to the security vulnerability based on the CVSS score and dynamic factors influenced by the threat landscape
columns.Name: VulnerabilitySeverityLevel

columns.Description: Name or description of the security update provided by the software vendor to address the vulnerability
columns.Name: RecommendedSecurityUpdate

columns.Description: Identifier of the applicable security updates or identifier for the corresponding guidance or knowledge base (KB) articles
columns.Name: RecommendedSecurityUpdateId

columns.Description: Array of tags relevant to the CVE; example: ZeroDay, NoSecurityUpdate
columns.Name: CveTags

columns.Description: Indicates the status of the workaround mitigation for the CVE on this device (possible values: applied, not applied, partially applied, pending reboot)
columns.Name: CveMitigationStatus
